comments.body: Adding the field values in `__repr__` caused extra slashes to escape the quotes, and apparently they end up in the exception string. To simplify the expected string, I used any characters around the field names in place of the slashes and quotes.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +901,905 @@    self.assertAllEqual(st.field_value(("a",)), 5)
    self.assertAllEqual(st.field_value(("b", "c")), [1, 2, 3])
    expected = "Field path \(.*a.*,.*b.*\) not found in .*"
    with self.assertRaisesRegexp(KeyError, expected):
      st.field_value(("a", "b"))
